import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ViewEncapsulation } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-index', templateUrl: './index.component.html', styleUrls: ['./index.component.css'], encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.None }) export class IndexComponent { }

Welcome to Shri Tailors

Contact Us

Email: contact@shritailors.com

Phone: +123-456-7890

What We Do

At Shri Tailors, we specialize in custom tailoring and clothing alterations. Our skilled tailors provide high-quality craftsmanship to ensure you get the perfect fit every time.

Features of Our Website

  • Easy online booking for tailoring services
  • Real-time order tracking
  • Personalized recommendations based on your style
  • Secure payment options
  • Customer support available 24/7
